original_title: 슈퍼 홍길동 2 - 공초 도사와 슈퍼 홍길동
overview: Taking time out of studying for a government exam, Hong Kil-dong teams up with Gangcho and a group of foreign warriors to defeat the evil of magistrate Byeon and his thugs.
title: Super Hong Gil-Dong 2 - Super Hong Gil-Dong And High Priest Kong-Cho
